meanings.definition: A name or title given to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The benaming of the new puppy was 'Buddy'.
meanings.sent2: She received the benaming 'Employee of the Month' for her hard work.
meanings.sent3: The benaming 'Queen Bee' suited her well as she ruled the school.
meanings.sent4: His benaming as 'The Great Explorer' inspired others to travel.
meanings.sent5: The benaming 'Little Picasso' highlighted his artistic talent.

meanings.definition: The act of naming or giving a name to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The benaming of the street was a tribute to a local hero.
meanings.sent2: The benaming of the baby brought joy to the family.
meanings.sent3: The benaming of the new ice cream flavor caused a stir in the town.
meanings.sent4: Her benaming of the stars in the sky made them seem closer.
meanings.sent5: The benaming of the ship 'Serenity' reflected its peaceful voyages.
